text:
Robert Felix Torti (born October 22, 1961) is an American actor and singer. Torti was born in Van Nuys, California. His career began with his role as Jesus and Jack in both the New York City and Los Angeles stage productions of "Reefer Madness".
He also played Kurt Martin on the Disney television series "The Suite Life of Zack & Cody" and "The Suite Life on Deck".

annotations.surface_form: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody
